DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the values of percutaneous transhepatic intrahepatic portosystemic shunt for treatment of portal vein occlusion with symptomatic portal hypertension after splenectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Percutaneous Transhepatic Intrahepatic Portosystemic Shunt for Treatment of Portal Vein Occlusion With Symptomatic Portal Hypertension After Splenectomy
DOC.criteria: All patients with portal hypertension who have the history of splenectomy and have enough image information to confirm occlusion of portal vein Patients with known severe dysfunction of heart, lung, brain, kidney and other vital organs
